reviews.review: My friend was mad at this game because he couldn't suck his own dong inbetween the portals, but I say that aspect is GREAT! But, if you want to add that feature in the game there is no complaints. I mean really, I dont care, but that feature wouldnt bother me. The feature doesnt sound that bad. Oh yea, and uh, its a good game 3/3.
a portal there a portal here and done.
Игра на логику, Графика хорошая, багов не нашёл, всем советую
Very Nice
Portal 2 is a puzzle/FPS. You don't shoot bullets, you shoot portals. Where can you go wrong? Voice acting is great, and the overall design is wonderful.
While it is a good game, some features were very late.

Portal 2 is a masterpiece and everybody already knows that. There's no way I legitimately played as many hours as I have logged, I must've left it idling back in like 2015 when I wrote the OG review (with the 2017 update). This is a game that needs no introduction.

10/10


Original review: [strike]Portal 2 is a GREAT game! I recommend getting the portal bundle so you can play the first one (if you haven't already, also the pack is a great deal) too. I have 100 hours on this game due to 7 playthroughs and all of the user-made levels to play.

If you like puzzles, then you'll LOVE this game. I really recommend not using ANY walkthroughs or spoiling anything for yourself before you play it. This review is short since I really would hate to spoil anybody's fun time in this game.

EDIT: 100%'d, hard but fair and rewarding.[/strike]
Um dos melhores jogos que já joguei. História simplesmente perfeita. Recomendo

i should tell my science teacher to give me this game for homework 10/10
Just the best fun co-op with a friend.  Insane puzzles, great user created content!
Engaging, fun, comedic and an overall good story. Big improvment on playtime compared to the first game, Portal 1. Now I just need to find someone to play Co-op with me :/

I don't care if you're a fan of Half-Life/Portal or not, just please, get this game.  It took everything that was great about Portal and made it better.  Better puzzles, better story, better robots, better everything!  This game definitely deserves the honor of being included with a preorder of the Steam Controller.  If you haven't already played this game, what are you waiting for?  It's definitely worth the cost, time, and effort required.
Fanatasy-Spiel, gut für ein bisschen Entspannung, gleichzeitig aber auch interessant und fesselnd.
Un ottimo gioco pieno di rompicapi da risolvere sia in giocatore singolo che in coop, in quest'ultima modalità il gioco rende al 100% con Epic Fails e risate a rotta di collo!!

Simply one of the best games i have ever played. Simple, funny, and you can play for hours without getting tired.

With the simpler puzzles and a story that goes a little too long, Portal 2 is not as good as it's predecessor. However, the content of the story and more humorous dialogue quickly overshadows the negatives. An amazing single-player campaign and surprisingly fun co-op mode, Portal 2 is a really good game.
Слишком легкая, я дольше в настройках лазил нежели проходил ее)) Но очень интересная)

Clever, well designed puzzles with fun mechanics.  Excellent co-op.  Engaging & amusing throughout.  Impressed, especially for a game that's now 4.5yrs old. 

Fun completing the challenges.  Even more fun trolling your teamate.  Win-win!

Controller spielbar!

Wer jetzt immer noch unschlüssig ist:
Die Unterhaltungen zwischen den Robotern (untereinander & zu dem Spieler) sind einfach nur geil, lustig, ...
man wird gemobt (auf spaßiger, sarkastischer Ebene) - ist einfach nur lustig zu lesen

Man kann es auch ohne Ton spielen (nicht gleicher Spielerlebnis), aber es gibt für "alles" ("Protal aktiviert", "Tür öffnet sich", ...) einen Untertitel...


Bei "Designed for Danger" Reihe gibt es ein Untertitel Problem: dieser wird audmf Englisch gestellt & man muss ihn über die integrierte Entwicklerconsole zurückstellen ([i]CC_lang "" [/i]

Weiters wird Überfall der Controller unterstützt - nur Conmunity Testkamnern bewerten erfordert eine Maus... Schade.

Not much more to be said about this game except that its original, fun, challenging enough at times and will live on as a classic game for a long long long time. Original, and fun in every way without having to be very violent or bloody. Great for kids and adults.
Gameplay, story, voiceacting, art, 10/10

Absolutely the best game I own.

Adds new mechanics not seen in Portal 1 that work fantastically. 
Brilliant voice acting and gameplay mechanics, I love the humor.
And with the community test chamber update, it has replayability.
AND it has Co-op.

A must have

10/10
Yes.

After delving in knowing nothing about Portal or Half-Life, I was pleasantly surprised at how fun and addictive this game was. A moderately hard puzzle game with great, DEVELOPED characters and an awesome story arch (that coming from a writer). I had so much fun playing this game and now I have a whole new universe to obsess over and allow to consume my soul :) oh, good times, good times.

It's more or less so the same as the first portal game in terms of mechanics, however it has 2 player co-op, an entirely separate set of puzzles from the single player mode, and still has witty dialogue in both game modes just like the previous game.

Definitely worth picking up.

This is great, the puzzles force you to think outside the box :)
It also has good humour and I love how they made it different from the first, by adding all of the different gels to make it more complex.
quite poggers, and a game i could definitely play multiple times over and enjoy every minute. 100% try it if you own a pc.

portal 2 tomó todo lo que tenia su predecesor y lo mejoró totalmente, aumentando los elementos a usar en los puzzles como los geles y laseres, graficamente se ve bien. ademas de la campaña tiene otros desafios y un co-op local (con dos joysticks) aunque en steam no aparezca esa caracteristica, las formas de personalizar a los robots son muy variadas y los logros harán obligatorio jugar en grupo. recomiendo altamente a portal 2 pero para disfrutarlo mas primero hay que jugar a portal 1

Ein guter sequel des ersten teils ^^

10 Чертовых лимонов из 10
先玩的portal2再去玩的1，2的感觉更好一点，特别是逃出实验室后进入光圈工厂那段。音乐特别好评，GLaDOS比1更毒舌，整体难度没有1高。强烈建议找人一起联机通双人，单人+双人流程一共大约20小时。（怎么还不数个3啊

This is one of valve's amazing games that raised the bar just like half life 2. The story, setting, and gameplay in portal 2 are amazing and will keep you playing and on the edge of your seat for many hours. I loved all the characters and the voice acting was amazing. If you like puzzles then pick up this game and the first one, You won't regret it.
love this game 10/10
